alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 20 at 12:57AM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 feet possible above 7000 feet...Up to a foot above 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds and heavy wet snow could bring down tree branches and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is expected mainly above 7000 feet through Thursday. A brief lull in the snowfall is possible Friday before another colder system brings additional heavy snow above 5000 feet through the weekend.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
